description:
Galaxy Raiders Cards - offline space card game

Simple offline card game for playing card duel with computer. No time limits, no building decks. Just simple playing for shorting your time. Pixel art cards.

STORY

Attention. Galactic invaders arrived to the Earth. It is necessary to prevent the attack and destruction of the Earth. Under your leadership, a space battle will start with attackers from the depths of the universe.

Galaxy Raiders Cards is a simple offline space card game, without building deck, without time limit, just playing.

The goal is simple - destroy the opponent's red base, which is protected by the space shields.

CARD TYPES

There are three types of cards in the game:

Attack cards

- Attacks on defense and base

Construction cards

- Builds defense or base

Science cards

- Helps with attacks or buildings

TIP! Double click for fast card playing!

HOW TO PLAY

Players alternate in playing cards. Each card has a value in the upper left corner for which it can be played. The energy of each round increases and it is possible to play higher cards or more cards with a lower value. When the player exhausted the energy, another player plays.

You can also skip round (right top corner) or drop the card. This continues until the winner is one of the players.

GOOD LUCK!
